entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Wind: NE 5 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
